abstract: NBA Roundup; Dallas Mavericks defeat New York Knicks, 91-89; other basketball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: J. J. Barea made a go-ahead layup with 49.9 seconds left and finished with 26 points for Dallas, now tied for the seventh-best record in the West.

headline.print_headline: Mavericks Edge Knicks; Warriors Improve to 68-7
headline.main: Fourth-Quarter Rally Lifts Mavericks Over Knicks

snippet: J. J. Barea made a go-ahead layup with 49.9 seconds left and finished with 26 points for Dallas, now tied for the seventh-best record in the West....
